title: I am quite annoyed with some of the issues your game is giving my computer.
body: My computer constantly crashes while using your game, it happens only with lol, no other game. And now it causes a remake 1 game away from promos and I lose LP. My computer runs fine for every game except yours, and it was not my internet or anything to do with it. It is really annoying to lose lp off of something that is out of my control. It feels very unfair. Is there a way we can work something out?

replies.body: What's going on when the game crashes? Are there any specific things that seem like it's causing the crash or is it just random? I'd love to help troubleshoot, but it's a little hard without much information. Let's go ahead and run through the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), but definitely hit me back up if that's not working and you have a little more info about what's happening.

my computer just kinda freezes and then turns off, I did some things where it is better but still crashes about once a game. My specs are fine. Are there any settings in game that I could tune to help this?

Our tech guys might be able to take a closer look at your system specs to see if there's anything that could use a tune up. Hit them up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and shoot them some logs using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and they should be able to help ^_^!
